name: Ethernet Virtual Connection/Virtual Connection
title: EVC/VC NUM
definition: Number Identifies each EVC/VC as a unique number.
usageNotes: Required when the first position of the REQTYP field on the ASR Form is “V” or “X” and the VC NUM on the VC Form is populated.
Required when the EVCI field on the ASR Form is populated.
fieldNotes: Once EVC/VC NUM is generated, it cannot be changed and is retained through completion of the request.
The values are to be assigned consecutively beginning with “0001” and incrementing by one for each additional VC.
